channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Leading The Charge: What It Takes To Be An Elite Engineering Team
item.description: As technology leaders, our vision for technology must be accompanied by strategic leadership in developing our engineering teams.
